CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Figure 5a shows the external quantum efficiency ( EQE ) spectra of PffBB-n / PC71BM - based PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PffBB-n: This is the name of a material used in the fabrication of the PSCs.
2. PC71BM: This is another material used in the fabrication of the PSCs.

Therefore, the two material names mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. PffBB-n
2. PC71BM
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the material names mentioned in the paragraph:

1. PffBB-n
2. PC71BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid material names mentioned in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-n |
| PC71BM |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Figure 5a shows the external quantum efficiency ( EQE ) spectra of PffBB-n / PC71BM - based PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. Figure: This is the name of the figure being referred to in the paragraph.
2. EQE: This stands for "External Quantum Efficiency" and is a measure of the efficiency of a solar cell in converting sunlight into electrical energy.
3. PffBB-n: This is a type of material used in the fabrication of the PSCs (Photovoltaic Solar Cells).
4. PC71BM: This is another type of material used in the fabrication of the PSCs.

So, the Property Name entities in the paragraph are: Figure, EQE, PffBB-n, and PC71BM.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Of course! Here are the entities that refer to Material Properties in the given paragraph:

1. PffBB-n
2. PC71BM

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer to Material Properties.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities that refer to Material Properties in the given paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-n |
| PC71BM |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Figure 5a shows the external quantum efficiency ( EQE ) spectra of PffBB-n / PC71BM - based PSCs.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. EQE: This stands for "External Quantum Efficiency" and is a measure of the efficiency of a solar cell in converting incoming light into electrical current. It is a property value that is represented by a spectrum in the figure.
2. PC71BM: This stands for "Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) (EDOT) / [6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester" and is a type of organic material used in the fabrication of the PSCs. It is a property value that is used to describe the composition of the PSCs.
3. PffBB-n: This stands for "PffBB-n" which is a type of PSCs that is fabricated using a specific method. It is a property value that is used to describe the type of PSCs being studied.

Therefore, the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph are EQE, PC71BM, and PffBB-n.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. EQE: This stands for "External Quantum Efficiency" and refers to the efficiency of a solar cell in converting incoming light into electrical current. It is a measure of the material property of the solar cell.
2. PC71BM: This stands for "Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) (EDOT)" and refers to a specific material used in the fabrication of the PSCs. It is a material property.

Therefore, the only two entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph are EQE and PC71BM.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column titled "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| External Quantum Efficiency (EQE) |
| Poly(3,4-ethylenedioxythiophene) (EDOT) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
